features: GO WIRED - 3.5mm Audio Connection is the ideal solution for online learning, enabling secured connection without interruption while the children focus on their live classes.
GO OVER-EAR DESIGN - Studio grade 40mm built-in speaker driver with noise isolation. Delivering accurate, clear audio for lectures, video meetings and rich audio for music and movie.
GO COMFORT - Padded soft cushioning, breathable while gentle on the ears. The cushions prevent overheating and ensure long lasting comfort.
GO FIT - Fit most children and teenagers age 5 and above. Adjustable slider, oval shaped ear covers and lightweight material selection making long listening more comfortable than ever.

GO COMPATIBLE - Whether it is and iPad, iPhone, Kindle Fire, Chromebook, Laptop or Computer, these headphones can connect to it all. Any audio devices with standard 3.5mm connections are compatible with OLITEC T1 Series.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions: Q: Do these headphones have a MIC? A: No, these headphones do not come with built-in microphone. However, you can use the microphone on the device you are connected to for voice input, and the other party will be able to hear you without any issues. Q: Do these headphones have Bluetooth? A: No, these headphones do not support Bluetooth connectivity. To use them, simply plug the cable into the audio port of your device. No need to worry about pairing or lost connections. Q: Do these headphones work with iPads/iPhones, Kindle, ChromeBooks, Fire Tablets, and Desktop/Laptop computers? A: Yes, these headphones are compatible to all the above and more, as they come with standard 3.5mm jack connector. However, if your device lacks a 3.5mm jack connector, you will need an adapter for connectivity, such as a USB-C or Lightning to 3.5mm jack adapter. Q: Are these headphones suitable for kids as young as 3 years old? Do they fit adults? A: Yes, these headphones are designed to fit children as young as 3 years old and can also comfortably accommodate adults. The headband size is adjustable, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit for most age groups. Q: Are these headphones suitable for use on airplanes? A: Yes, these headphones provide sufficient sound isolation to effectively reduce the noise on an airplane, enhancing your listening experience during the flight.

T1 Over-Ear Headphones Specifications Connection Wired, 3.5mm Audio Jack Plug-in Headphone Type Over Ear Weight 5.76 Ounce Cable Length 4 Feet Headband Adjustable, fits young children, teen and adult. Earcups Plush synthetic ear cups with 90 degree rotatable swivel design. To maximize comfort and fit, the earcups are adjustable to match the facial shape. Impedance 32±15% Ohm Frequency Response 20Hz - 20,000Hz Stereo Driver 40mm Noise Control Sound Isolation Compatibility iPads, Fire Tablets, Laptops and with various learning programs like Zoom, Google Classroom, Blackboard Learn, Microsoft Teams, Schoology and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, Versatility, and Durability
reviews.reviewText: The Olitec Kids Headphones are a commendable choice, especially tailored for young users. The over-ear design is a standout feature, providing a comfortable and immersive listening experience. This design not only enhances sound quality but also helps in noise isolation, ensuring that kids can enjoy their audio content without distractions.One of the noteworthy aspects is the headphones' suitability for diverse environments. Whether it's for school activities or long-travel journeys, these headphones prove to be versatile companions. The lightweight construction adds to the appeal, making them easy to carry and wear for extended periods, minimizing any discomfort.The inclusion of an Aux 3.5mm jack connection is a practical touch, allowing compatibility with a variety of devices. This feature enhances the headphones' usability, as kids can easily connect them to smartphones, tablets, laptops, or other gadgets commonly used for entertainment or educational purposes.Durability is often a concern with products designed for younger users, and here the Olitec Kids Headphones shine. The build quality ensures they can withstand the rigors of daily use, providing a reliable audio solution for an extended period.Overall, these headphones offer a well-rounded package of comfort, functionality, and durability, making them a commendable choice for parents seeking a reliable audio accessory for their kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for School Work
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these headphones for my son to use at school during his activities, and they have served their purpose perfectly. These headphones are straightforward and do precisely what they were intended for. My son enjoys using them, and they've become an essential tool for his schoolwork.It's important to note that these headphones are not designed to compete with high-end designer headphones, but they don't need to. They are functional, durable, and comfortable for my child to wear for extended periods. They provide clear sound quality for his educational materials and are a great tool for focused learning.In summary, these Kids Headphones have been a valuable addition to our school supplies. They are practical, get the job done, and my son finds them comfortable to use. If you're in need of headphones for your child's school activities, these are a reliable choice that won't break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well padded and wire knitted for ultimate flexibility .
reviews.reviewText: I like that wire are knitted to prolong wire life and avoid early breakage. Well padded for comfort. Sound is nice and clear but there could be a better kid controlled volume I think it does go to a volume too loud for kids would like if it had a volume restriction for little ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They fit bigger than expected.
reviews.reviewText: These headphones work well, and are comfortable for my young one, but they fit a bit bigger than expected. They constantly slide forward off his head. Overall very decent for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & Excellent buy
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this headphone. I purchased this for my 6 year old grandson for his school. He loves it. It’s light weight, cute and colorful, it works great. We loved it so much I ordered 2 more of this headphones. One for him to use at home and another one for his friend as a birthday present. You really can’t find any headphones with great quality and cute and colorful less than $10. It’s amazing

reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. Works great and puts away nicely. Great value. I’m happy

reviews.reviewText: My great grand daughter love it.we all love it cause we don't have to hear the noise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Faulty life expectancy
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for road trips for my son to listen to iPad. Worked well and the fit was great with the adjustable settings. Also comes with a long, tangle free cord which made travel and moving around easier. However, we only got afew uses out of the set we bought before the sound started to cut out of the headphones. We had to twist the jack to fix the sound
